markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Incredible Recollection](/Feats.aspx?ID=2668) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil](/Sources.aspx?ID=75) pg. 76

**Archetype** [Eldritch Researcher](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=89)

**Prerequisites**
[Eldritch Researcher Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2658)

</column>

---

You can sift through knowledge locked within your mind at an incredible pace. You instantly use up to 5 [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) actions. If you have any special abilities or free actions that would normally be triggered when you Recall Knowledge, you can't use them for these actions.
name: Incredible Recollection
primary_source_raw: Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil pg. 76
